title: [P2] About Modal Carousel - Icon Display Bug
description: Tech stack carousel in About modal broken: Backend card empty, Frontend card not centered. SVG icons not displaying/positioning correctly. Responsive design breaks on mobile. Root cause: Centering math in JavaScript. Status: Requires DevTools investigation to identify exact component failure (rendering, SVG loading, or centering calculation). Multiple related issues created (proj-6l6, proj-wew, proj-8o2, proj-203, proj-bsu, proj-83y, proj-27h). See those for detailed breakdown.
